keyToStrMap.Full:
Sam the Sausage Maker

Occupation:
[] Butcher 

Likes:
[] Eating, taking part in hotdog eating competitions

Dislikes:
[] Staying still, being hungry

Favourite quote:
[] What does it taste like?

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My dog Harry

How I came to be here:
[] Fell asleep and woke up here!

What I wish:
[] To play fetch with Harry again
